headline: America's science decline
text: This short video captures part of a public presentation by Neil deGrasse Tyson about how the amount of peer-reviewed scientific research done in the U.S. has decreased since 2000, and increased in other places like Japan, China, and Europe. Very concerning (for America, anyway):               Visit aroblesCG's YouTube channel [video link].
